name: The Random Menace
description:
You've always been that kind of tabletop player who always throws their dice a little too strong, making them fly all over the table and right on the ground. But that shall be no more! Eager for revenge, the mistreated and lost dices shall taste human blood tonight! Defend yourself, scum of the earth! 

  • Controls:
    • Mouse to aim
    • Left click to shoot
    • Right click to switch ammo
  • Credits
